summary: REQ-6 appears implemented: the UI now offers an “All columns” option, the search logic supports matching any cell in a row (exact or case-insensitive contains with trimming), and results continue to be displayed via the existing ResultsList with columns passed in.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer attribution and external link to caffeine.ai (with Heart icon), which is not part of REQ-6.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to enabling all-columns search and preserving client-side behavior; it does not request new footer/attribution content.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/changed warm coral/orange theme styling (global styles and Tailwind config changes) beyond the requested all-columns search behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 does not request any visual theme updates; these appear unrelated to enabling all-columns search.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions changes to frontend/src/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js)
